accentColor.title: Secondary color
accentColor.description: This color is used as an accent to the Primary Color.

genAccent.title: Generate complementary secondary color
genAccent.description: Generates a complementary color based on your selected Primary Color.

predefinedColor.title: Predefined colors
predefinedColor.description: Pick a predefined color from the Material Design palette. If you change the Primary Color it will override this settings.

paintCursor.title: Paint text editor's cursor
paintCursor.description: Overrides the syntax theme's cursor color with the selected Primary Color.

useAnimations.title: Use animations
useAnimations.description: Enables animations for clicked tabs and other UI elements.

hideTabBar.title: hide tab bar
hideTabBar.description: Hides the top tab bar, revealed on hover.

panelShadows.title: Panels cast shadows
panelShadows.description: Adds depth to the user interface by using shadows.

fontSize.title: User interface font size
fontSize.description: Scales the entire UI based on this value.
